test_cases.name: Verify successful login, company selection, and navigation to the Tasks page
preconditions: User has valid and active credentials.
The specified company exists and is assigned to the user.
The application is accessible at the base URL.

test_data.Email: A valid and active user Email.
test_data.Password: The correct Password for the user.
test_data.Company_Name: The exact Company_Name the user is associated with.

test_steps.action: Navigate to the Application base URL: https://alignwebdev.aligntoday.com/
test_steps.expected_result: The login page loads successfully, displaying the email input field.

test_steps.action: Enter a valid email address from the Excel file into the email input field.
test_steps.expected_result: The email address is correctly entered into the field.

test_steps.action: Click the 'Continue' button.
test_steps.expected_result: The application proceeds to the password entry screen.

test_steps.action: Enter the corresponding valid password from the Excel file into the password input field.
test_steps.expected_result: The password is correctly entered into the field.

test_steps.action: Click the 'Login' button.
test_steps.expected_result: User is successfully authenticated and redirected to the company selection page without errors.

test_steps.action: Wait for the company selection page to load and click on the correct company name as specified in the Excel file.
test_steps.expected_result: The specified company is selected, and the main application dashboard loads.

test_steps.action: Click on the 'Action Items' menu item in the navigation.
test_steps.expected_result: A submenu with options including 'Tasks' appears.

test_steps.action: Click on the 'Tasks' submenu option.
test_steps.expected_result: The application navigates to the 'Manage Tasks' page.

test_steps.action: Wait for the 'Manage Tasks' page to load completely.
test_steps.expected_result: The 'Manage Tasks' page is displayed, confirmed by the presence of the 'New Task' button.

test_cases.name: Verify creation of a basic task assigned to a single team member
preconditions: User is on the 'Manage Tasks' page.

test_data.Due_Date: A valid future Due_Date in 'MM/DD/YYYY' format.
test_data.Assigned_To: A single email address of a user who exists in the system.

test_steps.action: Click the 'New Task' button.
test_steps.expected_result: The task creation form opens successfully.

test_steps.action: Enter a valid task name in the 'Short Task Name' input field.
test_steps.expected_result: The task name is correctly populated in the input field.

test_steps.action: Enter a valid future date in 'MM/DD/YYYY' format into the date picker field and press ENTER.
test_steps.expected_result: The due date is correctly set in the date picker.

test_steps.action: Click the 'Search or Invite Team Members' input field.
test_steps.expected_result: The input field is focused and ready for text entry.

test_steps.action: Enter the email address of a single, existing team member.
test_steps.expected_result: An autocomplete dropdown appears with matching user options.

test_steps.action: Click the matching user option from the dropdown to select them.
test_steps.expected_result: The team member is successfully added to the assignment list.

test_steps.action: Scroll to the bottom of the form and click the 'Save' button.
test_steps.expected_result: The task is created successfully, and the application returns to the 'Manage Tasks' page.

test_steps.action: Verify the 'Manage Tasks' page has reloaded.
test_steps.expected_result: The 'New Task' button is visible, confirming the successful return to the task list page.

test_cases.name: Verify creation of a basic task assigned to multiple team members
preconditions: User is on the 'Manage Tasks' page.

test_data.Due_Date: A valid future Due_Date in 'MM/DD/YYYY' format.
test_data.Assigned_To: Two or more comma-separated email addresses of users who exist in the system.

test_steps.action: Click the 'New Task' button.
test_steps.expected_result: The task creation form opens successfully.

test_steps.action: Enter a valid task name in the 'Short Task Name' input field.
test_steps.expected_result: The task name is correctly populated in the input field.

test_steps.action: Enter a valid future date in 'MM/DD/YYYY' format into the date picker field and press ENTER.
test_steps.expected_result: The due date is correctly set in the date picker.

test_steps.action: For the first email in the 'Assigned_To' list: enter the email into the 'Search or Invite Team Members' field, wait for the dropdown, and click the matching user.
test_steps.expected_result: The first team member is successfully added to the assignment list.

test_steps.action: Clear the input field. For the second email in the 'Assigned_To' list: enter the email, wait for the dropdown, and click the matching user.
test_steps.expected_result: The second team member is successfully added to the assignment list.

test_steps.action: Scroll to the bottom of the form and click the 'Save' button.
test_steps.expected_result: The task is created successfully, and the application returns to the 'Manage Tasks' page.

test_steps.action: Verify the 'Manage Tasks' page has reloaded.
test_steps.expected_result: The 'New Task' button is visible, confirming the successful return to the task list page.

test_cases.name: Verify creation of a task with bulk assignment to 'All Users'
preconditions: User is on the 'Manage Tasks' page.

test_data.Due_Date: A valid future Due_Date in 'MM/DD/YYYY' format.

test_steps.action: Click the 'New Task' button.
test_steps.expected_result: The task creation form opens successfully.

test_steps.action: Enter a valid task name in the 'Short Task Name' input field.
test_steps.expected_result: The task name is correctly populated in the input field.

test_steps.action: Enter a valid future date in 'MM/DD/YYYY' format into the date picker field.
test_steps.expected_result: The due date is correctly set in the date picker.

test_steps.action: Scroll down and locate the 'Assign to all Users' checkbox.
test_steps.expected_result: The 'Assign to all Users' checkbox is visible.

test_steps.action: Click the 'Assign to all Users' checkbox to select it.
test_steps.expected_result: The checkbox is successfully selected.

test_steps.action: Scroll to the bottom of the form and click the 'Save' button.
test_steps.expected_result: The task is created successfully, and the application returns to the 'Manage Tasks' page.

test_cases.name: Verify creation of a task with bulk assignment to 'All Admins'
preconditions: User is on the 'Manage Tasks' page.

test_data.Due_Date: A valid future Due_Date in 'MM/DD/YYYY' format.

test_steps.action: Click the 'New Task' button.
test_steps.expected_result: The task creation form opens successfully.

test_steps.action: Enter a valid task name in the 'Short Task Name' input field.
test_steps.expected_result: The task name is correctly populated in the input field.

test_steps.action: Enter a valid future date in 'MM/DD/YYYY' format into the date picker field.
test_steps.expected_result: The due date is correctly set in the date picker.

test_steps.action: Scroll down and locate the 'Assign to all Admins' checkbox.
test_steps.expected_result: The 'Assign to all Admins' checkbox is visible.

test_steps.action: Click the 'Assign to all Admins' checkbox to select it.
test_steps.expected_result: The checkbox is successfully selected.

test_steps.action: Scroll to the bottom of the form and click the 'Save' button.
test_steps.expected_result: The task is created successfully, and the application returns to the 'Manage Tasks' page.

test_cases.name: Verify creation of a task with a 'File' type document attachment
preconditions: User is successfully logged in and on the 'Manage Tasks' page.
The file to be uploaded exists at the specified base path.

test_data.Document_File: A filename that exists at the base path.

test_steps.action: Click the 'New Task' button to open the task creation form.
test_steps.expected_result: The task creation form opens successfully.

test_steps.action: Enter a valid Task Name and Due Date.
test_steps.expected_result: Task name and due date fields are populated.

test_steps.action: Complete the Team Member Assignment step as per test data.
test_steps.expected_result: The specified team members are assigned.

test_steps.action: Scroll down and click the '+' icon next to 'Documents'.
test_steps.expected_result: The document upload dialog opens successfully.

test_steps.action: In the document dialog, enter the 'Document_Name'.
test_steps.expected_result: The document name is entered correctly.

test_steps.action: Enter the 'Document_Description'.
test_steps.expected_result: The document description is entered correctly.

test_steps.action: Ensure the document type is 'File'.
test_steps.expected_result: The 'File' document type is selected by default.

test_steps.action: Use JavaScript to make the hidden file input visible and send the full file path to the input element.
test_steps.expected_result: The file path is sent to the input, and the file begins to upload.

test_steps.action: Wait for the file to upload.
test_steps.expected_result: A visual indicator confirms the file has been uploaded successfully.

test_steps.action: Click the 'Save' button in the document dialog.
test_steps.expected_result: The document dialog closes, and the attachment is listed on the main task form.

test_steps.action: Click the main 'Save' button to create the task.
test_steps.expected_result: The task is created successfully with the file attachment, and the user is returned to the 'Manage Tasks' page.

test_cases.name: Verify creation of a task with a 'Link' document and alignments to Priority and Huddle
preconditions: User is successfully logged in and on the 'Manage Tasks' page.
The specified Priority and Huddle exist in the system.

test_steps.action: Click the 'New Task' button to open the task creation form.
test_steps.expected_result: The task creation form opens successfully.

test_steps.action: Enter a valid Task Name and Due Date.
test_steps.expected_result: Task name and due date fields are populated.

test_steps.action: Complete the Team Member Assignment step as per test data.
test_steps.expected_result: The specified team members are assigned.

test_steps.action: Click the 'Start typing to search Priorities' input, enter the priority name, wait for the dropdown, and select the matching priority.
test_steps.expected_result: The specified Priority is successfully found and selected.

test_steps.action: Click the 'Start typing to search Huddles' input, enter the huddle name, wait for the dropdown, and select the matching huddle.
test_steps.expected_result: The specified Huddle is successfully found and selected.

test_steps.action: Scroll down and click the '+' icon next to 'Documents'.
test_steps.expected_result: The document upload dialog opens successfully.

test_steps.action: In the document dialog, enter the 'Document_Name'.
test_steps.expected_result: The document name is entered correctly.

test_steps.action: Click the document type dropdown and select the 'Link' option.
test_steps.expected_result: The dialog fields change to accept a URL, and the type is set to 'Link'.

test_steps.action: Enter the specified URL into the 'Enter Link...' field.
test_steps.expected_result: The URL is entered correctly into the input field.

test_steps.action: Click the 'Save' button in the document dialog.
test_steps.expected_result: The document dialog closes, and the link document is listed as an attachment on the main task form.

test_steps.action: Click the main 'Save' button to create the task.
test_steps.expected_result: The task is created successfully with the link attachment and alignments, and the user is returned to the 'Manage Tasks' page.

test_cases.name: Verify sequential creation of multiple tasks in a single user session
preconditions: An Excel file is prepared with at least two rows of complete and valid task data.
The first row contains valid login credentials.
The application is stable and does not have an aggressive session timeout.

test_data.Test_Data_Source: An Excel file containing at least two rows of complete and valid task data.
test_data.Row_1_Data: Must contain valid Email, Password, Company_Name, and all required task fields.
test_data.Row_2+_Data: Must contain all required fields for task creation.

test_steps.action: For the first task in the Excel file, execute the full login and navigation flow to reach the 'Manage Tasks' page.
test_steps.expected_result: The user is logged in and the 'Manage Tasks' page is displayed.

test_steps.action: Execute the complete task creation flow for the first task row.
test_steps.expected_result: The first task is created successfully, and the system returns to the 'Manage Tasks' page.

test_steps.action: For the second task in the Excel file, verify the 'New Task' button is visible on the current page.
test_steps.expected_result: The session is confirmed to be active and on the correct page.

test_steps.action: Execute only the task creation flow (starting from clicking 'New Task') for the second task row.
test_steps.expected_result: The second task is created successfully in the same session, and the system returns to the 'Manage Tasks' page.

test_steps.action: Repeat the previous two steps for all subsequent tasks in the Excel file.
test_steps.expected_result: All tasks from the Excel file are created sequentially without any session timeouts or unexpected logouts.
